caption: Friendly staff , pretty good beer selection
Great to return to the Bistro after several years out of Hayward. Glad to see that they're managing to keep going with outdoor seating during the pandemic.

They have nice selection of craft beers. Staff are very friendly. The regulars are very nice as well. I always get Russian River beers on tap then try different beers on their list. It widened my taste for beers.
This spot is worth visiting. They serve large portions for convenient prices. Regularly neat and with fantastic character. Highly recommended.
Live music new hours open everyday
The Bistro is a must go for a place to drink craft brews from the area. Been going here for over 20 years love it!!!
Excellent food, great beer menu, awesome music
Socially distanced drinks and live music feels like a real treat in 2020
Great Choice for Beers. Every Saturdays they got some live music start around 3pm. Nice outdoor seatings and you can meet nice people here.
Love the atmosphere and people and place. This place is lovely for downtown hayward :)

August 1st 2020  Live music and dancing is fantastic. Outdoor tents set up and right next door to the Italian restaurant with their tents set up so there was lots of room to spread out. A few bartenders at the front door made things really …
Great musician  every week .brewed beer on tap and every week change. Appetizer too and people very friendly. Love this place
They always have amazing beers on tap. Absolutely a local fav of mine. My parents have been going there for over 20 years and they adore the vibe and musical acts.
Precovid— amazing wine selection. They had some pretty cool bands/musicians that played. Great location in downtown Hayward. Looking forward when life returns to normal.
I haven't been here but it looks good
Love this place.  Always friendly service, great LIVE bands and of course an awesome selection of the finest brew around.
This is a very relaxing environment with plenty of triple ipas on draft, Wetting My Whistle never felt so great!

We went there to see a friend's band play. It's a very small bar and it is cash only. The beers we ordered we're not as cold as you want them to be and one of them wasn't even full all the way. 12 bucks not worth it
only beer and wine. All I could drink here was a glass of water. enjoyed the entertainment.
Nice beer selection but over priced.
Good beer, good company and a nice little band.
Fun local venue.
Point the younger was great but only once a year really
Truly great bistro or pub with superb craft beers and other stuff. Friendly and local, welcoming vibe, plus great live music, just wow!
Good food
Really good band and beer
Fun hole in the wall.  Wish there was an extra bartender to speed up service
Mike is the best Bartender, attentive and polite!
Need more bathrooms, only had 1
The live music, open mic, beers on tap, and community are all so welcoming.

Friendly and welcoming, they have a Monday open mic for musicians, comedians, poetry, you name it, and while the audience may ne cricjet quiet when you want to hear laugh or cheers, they are still encouraging and kind. So, if you want good …
Chill vibe with some great beers and live music
Good people great beers...
Fun venue, and the staff is really friendly.
Best local dive bar in Hayward. Local music and Pliny the elder on tap makes this one of my favorite places to spend a Saturday night.
Mico brew selections and variety of music for the evenings are always on the menu. NO COVER CHARGE!
Got to see "The Siblings" tonight playing at The Bistro. What a great music venue!!!
Great pub. I highly recommend going to the first Thursday of the month comedy show. They have allot of talented performers.
Good beer selection and friendly staff, will definitely be stopping by again.

Best place to have great beer. Always a great selection of craft beer in tap. Always friendly service. Always feel at home at the b st bistro. And on a warm summer night there is no better place to listen to amazing live music then in the beer garden at the B st Bistro.
Nice place, great music, but bar tender needs to be trained.
Does it get better than the SF Beer Week Triple IPA festival.?.?.?  No it doesn’t. Get here for that great beer during beer week.  10/10 would return.
Good food. $$ fast service

This is the worst racist place. We went on July 24th, 2018 between 9pm abd 11pm, the fat bartender was very slow and disrespectful. He told us that he is not pouring beer at 11pm. Hell with this place.
A simple spot. Get a beer, enjoy the music. Went on a monday and caught the end of open mic night. Lot of really friendly people and humble, entertaining performers. I look forward to going again.
Dive with great beer and music every night.

Great selection of craft beers.   Live music almost every evening.  Outdoor patio seating in downtown hayward.  Usually Pliney is on tap and you can never go wrong with that.  The bartenders are friendly and knowledgable.
Great selection of beers at nice high bar prices though you get the music ambiance. Go to a liquor store or grocery for better price.
Lovely little bar. Good IPAs. Went for a colleagues' live music show. Good crowd.
Creepy
Nice place, friendly staff.  Good for a quick meal
Lots of choices for beer for sure.  The sound quality with the bands that play there is surprisingly pretty good. Not a large place, but lots of fun. Bring cash and buy a patch!
Fun, lots of brew on tap, righteous prices, good music! What's not to like?
Never actually been
Cozy place with live music.
wrong order
The bartender was slow n beer was not good they need to clean there beer lines
On Mondays they have one of the best open mics in the bay area.
Good little cash only bar, they have beer and wine, but that's about it.
Live music every night and great beer. Love that place

I love this place, but i'm kind of a ringer. Pro's; An ever changing selection of craft beers, shading heavily on more local names, but with many others as well. Free live music every day. Dog friendly. And an outdoor patio which can be …

Beer. Do you like beer? The Bistro likes beer.  And live music. Do you like live music? There's live music - check the calendar.  Do you like having an outdoor seating area? Boom. There you have great people watching, although you'll be well served waiting for Summer nights.  Did I mention beer?  Good beer.
Family atmosphere!!
The selection of beers are good. The bands are WAY too loud inside the small space. Love the music, but can't stay due to possible hearing loss.

Great location. Great vibe. Great music. Great employees.  But no credit cards is ridiculous. We go there for a short time and then leave when we are out of cash and go to the other bars that are more customer friendly. Take cards and I wod bump to 5!
Good beer and local music.  Bus stop near by. But be careful it is a cop trap at times.
Live music and beer! All's good

I love the Bistro!  They have a great beer selection with lots of events throughout the year. The IPA Fest to their Barrel Aged Beer Fest, will offer you a great, thoughtful and hard to find beers, all in one location. Vic works incredibly …
Great local spot with fabulous beer selection!
If i told you big foot exist you wouldn't believe me but if i told you the bistro has the best mixed open mic every Monday night then you would.  Think im lying come on in and prove it!
They have good beer on tap. Good music to listen to. Friendly people.

The place is okay, the bar tender is nice and also the owner. It is a good place to hang out also, they have a little small stage where a local band or singer performs for that night. I gave them a 3 because its cash only and that throws people off.
Lots of ales and stouts. Hardly any lagers.
Love all of their beer events
(Translated by Google) Super nice weather!  (Original) Clima super agradável!
Always good beers on Tap, live music, & fun folks (and dogs) just remember to bring Cash! ;)
Great hang out with beer, wine, some snacks and live music!
Free live music
Always a great selection of beer.
PLINY!!!
Best beer on B street!
Great music and beer
Great variety of live music and a rotating selection of good beers.
Fun times and great location in Hayward.  Good service too!!
A great place to get GOOD beer, and watch local talent!!!

This establishment appears to be an established "night spot": a bar (wine bar?) which apparently features live music at nights. I visited in mid-afternoon-- I'd wanted a specific meal for a late lunch but couldn't find a restaurant. And I …
Great people, great beer and great music
Fun spot with tasty beers.
Love the outdoor patio
The People Really Cool Atmosphere Welcoming Service Execellent
Small local joint with live music and good beers on tap
Has the best beer

My favorite bar in the bay area, it showcases the finest brews and eclectic music. As for the eclectic mix of performers that come in every night to what they serve this place is a gem. No liquor but no problem, the drinks are hard
I used to come here and 2 watch my friend play She.never got an official gig so I eventually stopped coming but I had fun while I was there most of the time
Great simple food paired with beers and wine. Live music, casual spot. Salads, crowded on the sunny weekends.
(Translated by Google) Great Jaz Jam Today  (Original) Great Jaz Jam Today
One of the best craft beer bars in the East Bay.   Great selection of craft beers in a variety of styles and they always have great IPA's on tap.
I like the bistro and good price and magical food is heaven
Good beer, no desent food
This place is alright. Decent beer selection. Live music on many nights. I'd probably come here more often if it wasn't cash only.
Great place to meet good people and good conversations
Went to watch a friend band play. It was a lot of fun...
Had a very nice meal here this Sunday. Quiet atmosphere. Great service and our meal was extremely good.
Awesome beer selection!
Great place for live music
This is Hayward's best spot for some music and a cold IPA beer!!
Excellent choice of beers.
The band that played on Saturday night was great!!!! Vito played the guitar, he was incredible to say the least.
Awesome bar and great event with the double / triple IPA festival
Cash only.
Great beer selection
Great bar great beer great staff
Beer selection is great, hard to find beers on tap, bring cash no debit.
I love it good food good music good drink
Blues Theory played .  it was AWESOME.

Tasty Italian resturant with good food and very friendly staff, the lemon gelato was soo tasty I loved it, Its also a family resturant which had high chair for the kids. Since it was a good resturant u will have to wait for some minutes so that they arrange the table for you in rush hours.
Dive bar, with super selection of craft beers on tap
I wish he held my hand and kissed me when we were here.

This place has a great selection of local beers! They serve finger food  like chips and salsa or some kind of guacamole dip! But... Every time I walk in there it's like somebody mopped the place with that dirty mop or those moldy rags …
Good place to eat just few minutes from hotel room Starbucks coffee 24hrs. Friendly staff.
A truly great place to enjoy local talent. Best draft beer in the East Bay.
Excellent bartender and port wine.  🍷
Best local open mic for local talent and recruitment
Nice beers, band and bartender
Nice little bistro with live music! We had a good time.
Great beer selection, daily live entertainment
Nice place with a live band nightly. Lots of special beers and wine.
Very good live music on weekends. Large selection of beers. The place fills up fast so need to be there early when there is music to get a table.
Good place to have a beer and see local bands play.
Live music and always have a good selection of beers. Cash only though.
Music everynight! Something magical about this place
Always something interesting on tap. Live music every night. Fun, loud atmosphere. Sit outside and enjoy the B Street views. Cash only but there's an ATM inside if you forget.
Large selection of IPAs
Quaint watering hole featuring craft beers on tap, nice outdoor seating, live music. Funky bohemian decor, all around good vibes
I cant believe this establishment fired the only minority employee for no reason she was attentive beautiful respectful and a delight when being at the bistro. Highly disappointed in the owner vick
Awesome home away from home feel
Very small, nothing to eat that not a fully stocked bar. Fun to hang with friends and listen to jams.
Great variety of beers on tap!

Great beer on tap here. They almost always have one Pliney or the other. It would be nice if they had a better lunch menu. They allow dogs in the outside area and it would be great to enjoy some good food and a cold beer on a Saturday afternoon after hike with the pooch.
Pretty chill place to have a beer and have a big group of people. Beer is good and music fits the environment.
One of the best local music locations around, and their beer choices have really 'stepped up' !!
(Translated by Google) I did not like  (Original) No me gusto
Usually good craft beers. Sometimes music too loud and you need to sit outside.
Great selection of beers! There is also live music on some nights
3 thumbs up. Had to borrow one!
A great place to hop off the merry go round for a while to enjoy a cold one with great music.

Jeff the bartender here knew his Beer . Every Beer he poured me was exactly what i was looking for! Good conversation. The patrons were friendly. The music was great. I really enjoyed my visit here. My dog was even welcomed on the outside patio.
Great atmosphere and friendly bartenders.
killer jazz jam and tap selection
Not fancy, but always interesting beers. Always have Pliny the Elder on tap.
No food served, just drinks.  Had to go to a different restaurant to get finger food.  Poor customer service.
Great spot - have been there many times, including yesterday. Great beers, but in my opinion, they're not cold enough.
Good beer selection and they have music
Always a good time at the bistro. Good beer, dog friendly, nice outdoor patio. All i need is right there!
Wish they had more than just beer
Always Pliney on tap.
Great beer
Amazing brews and the best people around to have a drink with!

This place is great if you just want to hang out and drink a beer! It's dog friendly and the outdoor seating is great when the weather is nice. The bar food is just snacks, but if you're hungry there are a lot of good options in the area with takeout that you can bring back to the bar.
Awesome beer selection and decent bar food. Good prices at happy hour and often crowded.
Great beers and good tunes! Couldn't ask for more.
Modern day cheers
Big huge The Bistro!
Love this place. I've never walked into the Bistro without a friendly welcome and a great beer. Just remember to bring cash.
Great beer selection, live local music!
Craft Beer bar. With live music.
Great beer list and a tasty BLT.

This is the type of place I look for in every new town I visit. Great beer and live music! I just moved to the area and I am very sure after one visit that it will be one of my go to places. Check it out if you're in town
Great selection of craft beers. Chill little spot to hang out.
Cool easy going bar. Bartender was really cool.
Live music and great beer!
Great beer selection
Great intimate venue.
Good selection, friendly people

I'm biased perhaps, because I know a lot of the regulars and bartenders, but I honestly think this one of the best pubs. Very friendly atmosphere plus an excellent, extensive for a bar), and authentic English menu. The owner Steve really wants his customers to be satisfied with their service. I recommend you try it.

Awesome local place with great beer and casual food on a walkable street with outdoor patio seating. The place is nice and relaxed with a friebdly staff and a great beer selection. The bar and main area offer casual seating and a cozy atmosphere.
I do not want to give out all of the little secrets about this joint. Locals know why it is special and we will leave it at that ;-)
Good bear, shade,  music and you can allways find someone to talk whit
Good food
The owners are super sweet and home-y
Best beers and best local yocal artist to lay your music. They rock
Hayward's  best kept secret. This place is perfect. I hope this place never changes.
Great tasting fresh beers. The live music from Thursday night was a great listen as well.
I enjoy the atmosphere,  a bit pricey for the area.
Great beer. Good live music.

Hayward's best live music bar. I'd call it a dive bar, but it is nicer and not as crusty as your usual hole in the wall. It has friendly bartenders, great outdoor seating and good selection of drinks. Live music performances on daily basis …

The wife and I were mainly here for the live music. The band was great and we really liked the atmosphere, but the appetizer selection was bad. There was only three things to choose from. We got the 7 layer dip nachos, I got a beer and my …

Stumbled upon this bar one night when my girlfriend and I were looking for night life in Hayward... Yay for live music and craft beer! Decent selection for the micro brewery lovers. If the music is too loud and there's no more room inside, bring it to the patio!
Outdoor seating

One of those places where, if you go a few times, everyone knows your name, like "Cheers".  I especially like the Open Mics on Mondays.  A favorite "one holer" bar of mine.  Has that local neighborhood bar vibe.  Eclectic, funky and cool.

A bit seedy. I dont know if I would eat there. Great beer selection. Open mic on Mondays and Tuesdays is cool. Some real talent shows up. The bartender, John, is friendly and quick. He doesn't let you sit with an empty glass. Unless you like it that way. Good place to go stag.
Bartends LOVE their work, and the performers, and will give you background info gladly.
